dmca.title: Defamation and Personal Bank Account Numbers Published for 5 Years
dmca.body:
The webmaster of www.fanyicn.net and www.fane.cn defomated me using his own websites for amolst 5 years. He published defamated words and all my personal infomration and my bank account numbers on his pages of his website as follows：
 

http://www.fanyicn.net/bbs/read.php?tid-418-uid-13.html
http://www.fane.cn/forum_view.asp?forum_id=31&view_id=61785
http://fanyicn.net/bbs/read.php?tid-418-fpage-5-page-2-skinco-thewei-pw1.html

I ever file complaints to Google Inc., however I got no response. Now I've talked to my USA lawyer and intend to file a lawsuit against Google Inc.  

I can not bear any more for the 5-years lasted defamation of personal injury and typical crimmal infromation to me.


Yan S.
